Tree Plot test
```{R}
go_terms <- test$ID
go_terms <- unname(go_terms)
simMatrix <- calculateSimMatrix(go_terms, orgdb = "org.Hs.eg.db", ont = "MF", method = "Rel")

```

```{R}
scores <- setNames(-log10(test$qvalue), test$ID)
reduceTerms <- reduceSimMatrix(simMatrix, scores, threshold = 0.7, orgdb = "org.Hs.eg.db")
```
```{R}
shinyEnrichment(test1, simMatrix = reduceTerms)

```

```{R}


treeEnrichment <- function(reduceTerms, title = "Title"){
    plot <- treemap::treemap(reduceTerms, index = c("parentTerm", "term"), vSize = "score", type = "index",
                    title = title, palette = "Greys", fontcolor.labels = c("#FFFFFFDD", "#00000080"), 
                    bg.labels = 0, border.col = "#00000080")
    return(plot)
}

treeEnrichment(reduceTerms, title = "Hello")
```
